channel.title: How do you add prayer icons to the server? The tut was lost in the deletion
channel.description: I heard that it is half client-side and half server side. What is the server side? A link would be nice.

item.title: How do you add prayer icons to the server? The tut was lost in the deletion
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

this the server side bit

//---------------------------------------------------------//
case 21245: // Protect From Magic
if(ProtMage == false)
{
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 15;
DrainPray = true;
ProtMage = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 4;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(ProtMage == true)
{
ProtMage = false;
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;
//---------------------------------------------------------//
case 21246: // Protect From Range
if(ProtRange == false)
{
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 15;
DrainPray = true;
ProtRange = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 2;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(ProtRange == true)
{
ProtRange = false;
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break; 
//---------------------------------------------------------//
case 21247: // Protect From Melee
if(ProtMelee == false)
{
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 15;
DrainPray = true;
ProtMelee = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 1;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(ProtMelee == true)
{
ProtMelee = false;
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break; 
//---------------------------------------------------------//
case 2171: // Retribution
if(Retribution == false)
{
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 10;
DrainPray = true;
Retribution = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 8;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(Retribution == true)
{
Retribution = false;
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;
//---------------------------------------------------------//
case 2172: // Redemption
if(Redemption == false)
{
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 10;
DrainPray = true;
Redemption = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 32;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(Redemption == true)
{
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
Redemption = false;
}
break;
//---------------------------------------------------------//
case 2173: // Smite
if(Smite == false)
{
noprayer();
ResetProtPrayers();
NewDrain = 15;
DrainPray = true;
Smite = true;
newdrain();
headIcon = 16;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(Smite == true)
{
Smite = false;
headIcon = 0;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;
//---------------------------------------------------------//
